Click on the icon to modify the icon content, and click on the modify cover to modify the cover address (can be url or tiddler title). Use the following fields to store the page's icon and cover information. * `icon` stores the icon, which can be an emoji, WikiText or tiddler title. * `page-cover` stores the url of the cover or the title of the tiddler. !!
